QuestData.Title: A Hearty Thanks!
QuestData.Description: You saved my life, $n! Thank you so much! That beast would have torn me to shreds if it weren't for you.$B$BIf you see the exarch at Azure Watch, tell him of what you did. I'm sure he'll be pleased to hear such news!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Exarch Menelaous at Azure Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $N. Well done indeed! You are turning out to be a special $R - a cut above the others of your age. Take this as a reward!
